name: Berry Boost
description: A vibrant blend of a√ßai, strawberry, blueberry, and banana with almond milk. Topped with granola, chia seeds, and coconut flakes.

name: Tropical Glow
description: Tropical paradise with mango, pineapple, banana, and coconut milk. Topped with toasted coconut, fresh kiwi, and hemp seeds.

name: Green Power
description: Nutrient-packed with spinach, avocado, apple, and banana in oat milk. Topped with pumpkin seeds and cacao nibs.

name: Peanut Protein
description: Rich and satisfying with peanut butter, banana, cacao, and your choice of whey or plant protein. Topped with banana chips and peanuts.

name: Chocolate Dream
description: Decadent cacao base with banana, dates, and almond milk. Topped with dark chocolate chips, almonds, and fresh berries.

name: Sunset Bowl
description: Beautiful pitaya base with dragon fruit, mango, and passion fruit. Topped with edible flowers, goji berries, and coconut.
